files.patch:
@@ -178,8 +178,2 @@
-  ifeq ($(call isCompiler, gcc), true)
-    JVM_CFLAGS_FEATURES += $(CXX_O_FLAG_LTO)
-    JVM_LDFLAGS_FEATURES += $(CXX_O_FLAG_HIGHEST_JVM) $(LDFLAGS_LTO)
-  else ifeq ($(call isCompiler, clang), true)
-    JVM_CFLAGS_FEATURES += $(CXX_O_FLAG_LTO)
-    JVM_LDFLAGS_FEATURES += $(CXX_O_FLAG_HIGHEST_JVM) $(LDFLAGS_LTO)
-  else ifeq ($(call isCompiler, microsoft), true)
-    JVM_CFLAGS_FEATURES += $(CXX_O_FLAG_LTO)
+  JVM_CFLAGS_FEATURES += $(CXX_O_FLAG_LTO)
+  ifeq ($(call isCompiler, microsoft), true)
@@ -187,0 +181,2 @@
+  else
+    JVM_LDFLAGS_FEATURES += $(CXX_O_FLAG_HIGHEST_JVM) $(LDFLAGS_LTO)
